Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- {passiveImg:once}Damage reduction rate 77%{passiveImg:up_g} for 1 turn
- ATK & DEF 300%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained
- Attacks are effective against all Types
- Guards all attacks
- High chance of performing a critical hit
- Medium chance of evading enemy's attack
- Changes Ki Spheres: INT to Rainbow
*For 4 turns from the character's entry turn*
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT
excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
*For every Ki Sphere obtained*
- ATK & DEF 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 100%)
*For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading 
enemy's attack 10%{passiveImg:up_g}
*7 or more Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When attacking with 20 or more Ki*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki*
- ATK 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking*
- {passiveImg:once}Performs a critical hit and launches an additional 
Super Attack when the enemy's HP is 50% or more
*When receiving an attack*
- {passiveImg:once}Evades enemy's attack when HP is 50% or less

7337.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK and 
greatly raises DEF for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Fusion
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Causes ultimate damage to enemy and, 
within the turn activated, 
all attacks become critical hits
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when HP is 50% or less, 
or when facing only 1 enemy, 
whose HP is 50% or less (once only)
